Package index

Available datasets

published_pins
Datasets published to the Haemdata pin board
metadata_hsa
Minimal metadata for human samples
metadata_mmu
Minimal metadata for mouse samples
haemdata_env
Package environment

Accessing data

Get latest pin version

get_pin_list()
Get pin list

Datasets published to the Haemdata pin board

Setup the pinboard for use

Update SummarisedExperiment

Merge a pair of SummarisedExperiments

nf-core/rnaseq to SummarisedExperiment

qc_filter_se
pca_se()
Perform PCA on a SummarisedExperiment

Write an expression matrix to file
